text: Jene rakhuna, abimisra anugatya allahara'i prapya. Ara yara allahara paribarte an'yaderake abhibhabakarupe grahana kare tara bale, 'amara to edera ibadata e jan'ye kari ye, era amaderake paripurnabhabe allahara sannidhye ene debe [1].â€™ Tara ye bisaye nijedera madhye matabheda karache niscaya allaha tadera madhye se byapare phayasala kare debena.
